# Interface: WorldDef

## Hierarchy

* **WorldDef**

## Index

### Properties

* [allowSleep](worlddef.md#optional-allowsleep)
* [blockSolve](worlddef.md#optional-blocksolve)

## Properties

### `Optional` allowSleep

• **allowSleep**? : *boolean*

[default: true]

___

### `Optional` blockSolve

• **blockSolve**? : *boolean*

[default: true]

___

### `Optional` continuousPhysics

• **continuousPhysics**? : *boolean*

[default: true]

___

### `Optional` gravity

• **gravity**? : *Vec2*

[default: { x : 0, y : 0}]

___

### `Optional` subStepping

• **subStepping**? : *boolean*

[default: false]

___

### `Optional` warmStarting

• **warmStarting**? : *boolean*

[default: true]
